title: Am I the only one that think's Zilean's w is dumb?
body:
For a guy that is about time, Zilean's w ( reducing his spells cooldowns) seems like wasted potential
I know Riot wants him to be a support, but how awesome would it be if it instead did
__**Rewind : Reduces an ally's cooldowns by 30%**_ _

Instead of,

__Rewind: Zilean reduces the cooldown of timebomb and timewarp by 10 seconds__

As it is, his passive looks dumb. They might as well change it to a Lissandra-esque passive like
"Passive: Foreseen-Future : Every 10 seconds, Zilean can cast a non-ultimate spell with no cost. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown by 1 second"

so that he can still cast his double bombs/ double time warps

He looks like a friggin god ( look at his splash art, dude looks powerful) and yet all he does is run around throwing bombs and... getting the ability to throw MORE bombs! :D
I know that such a spell would be difficult to balance, but his w has so much support potential. Maybe even increase an enemy's cd? refresh your ally's summoner's spells?

I'm just throwing this out here, Any thoughts community?

tldr: Zilean's w seems like wasted potential. For a rewind spell, reducing ally's cds would feel much more awesome than your own

replies.body:
I'd prefer to see Rewind take 5 seconds off his _item cooldowns_ with every use.

This would lead to some very interesting Zilean builds [Righteous Glory! Lich Bane! Hextech Gunblade!] and add to the feeling of being an intelligent time magician greatly.

They've been doing crazy gimmicks lately, so this would fit nicely.
His W need to be his passive, and open a new slot to a new passive! IMO.

its the only ability he can't use on allies. And if it was castable on allies-it would be OP. And if it is nerfed later-it would be useless on Zilean
If you need some OMFG TIME MAGE explanation-imagine if he STOPS THE TIME FOR ENTIRE WORLD INCLUDING REAL WORLD TOO, and waits 10 seconds so his abilities are refreshed. And if this spell needs buffs-add hp and mana equal to 10 seconds of regen
zilean would be ban worthy if he lowered his allies cooldowns
